title: Todo Delete Items
description: Master deleting todos, implementing undo/recovery, and managing deletion lifecycle with proper cleanup
learningOutcomes: Remove multiple todos with bulk operations
Update DOM when todos are deleted
Clear storage when todos are removed
Handle edge cases in deletion operations
